message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first as a valued potential customer.  I'm asking for $20,000 for it. It's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $15,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I can't go as low as $15,000, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This product is truly top-notch and worth every penny.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. However, I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $16,000 for the product.
